amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to require CMS to create and implement a measure in the Star Ratings program evaluating Medicare Advantage and Part D plans on how well they provide access to biosimilar drugs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to require CMS to create and implement a measure in the Star Ratings program evaluating Medicare Advantage and Part D plans on how well they provide access to biosimilar drugs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Tonko.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
